artist: Circle of Federico Zuccaro; Circle of Taddeo Zuccaro; Formerly attributed to Francesco Salviati or his circle
description: central rectangular image of man wearing helmet and carrying shield, riding a rearing horse; three female figures at left; round building in URC; nude female figure standing on an orb at left; female caryatid at right; decorative frieze below
medium: Pen and brown ink and brush and brown wash
provenance: Private collection, United States; sale, Christie's, London, July 7, 1987, no. 113, for Â£850, to Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1987-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Heroism of Marcus Curtius
